Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.backend.backend.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Implementation of UserService. Contains the business logic for changing the user's password securely.
